annotations.description: The Dude's favorite drink made five ways, each better than the last! White Russian Variations for the Big Lebowski! A long while back I tackled the White Rus...
annotations.title: The Dude's White Russian and Variations | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Cold Brew Coffee
4 oz. -or- 120 ml. whole milk (might cut back in half)
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. sambuca (if you like licorice)
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. vodka
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. St. George Coffee Liqueur

Shake & Strain
Garnish with Cocoa

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Sgw1oD6acY
title: The Dudes Delight
